title: AI Logging for Compliance
summary: For regulated industries, 'compliance by design' with AI interaction logging transforms AI from compliance risk into compliance asset

content.whatItIs: Anthropic partnered with Allianz to make Claude Code available to all employees and build custom AI agents that execute multistep workflows with human-in-the-loop. Critical compliance feature: AI system logs all interactions for regulatory transparency.
howItWorks: Claude Code deployed to all employees at one of world's largest insurance companies
Custom AI agents for multistep workflows with human-in-the-loop oversight
Critical feature: AI system logs all AI interactions for transparency and regulatory compliance
Logging creates audit trail reviewable for regulatory purposes, internal compliance, or dispute resolution
Hybrid approach satisfies both efficiency goals and regulatory requirements
content.coreInsight: For regulated industries, 'compliance by design' (logging all AI interactions) enables AI adoption where it might otherwise be blocked. The audit trail approach transforms AI from a compliance risk into a compliance asset. Human-in-the-loop agent design satisfies regulators while delivering automation benefits. 'Transparency as feature' creates competitive advantage in regulated markets.
content.keyMetrics: Anthropic now commands 40% of enterprise LLM spend vs. OpenAI's 27% (reversed from 2023). 85% of Anthropic revenue from business customers. Client base: under 1,000 to 300,000+ in two years.
